Notes
Validation Errors:
Half-Orc-Beastmaster Alternatives: Beastmaster may not be combined with Orc Ferocity, Bestial, Gatecrasher, Plagueborn, Sacred Tattoo, or Toothy
Half-Orc-Bestial Alternatives: Bestial may not be combined with Orc Ferocity, Beastmaster, Gatecrasher, Plagueborn, Sacred Tattoo, or Toothy
Half-Orc-Cavewight Alternatives: Cavewight may not be combined with Intimidating, Plagueborn, Rock Climber, or Scavenger
Half-Orc-Gatecrasher Alternatives: Gatecrasher may not be combined with Orc Ferocity, Beastmaster, Bestial, Plagueborn, Sacred Tattoo, or Toothy
Half-Orc-Plagueborn Alternatives: Plagueborn may not be combined with Intimidating, Cavewight, Rock Climber, Scavenger, Orc Ferocity, Beastmaster, Bestial, Gatecrasher, Sacred Tattoo, or Toothy
Half-Orc-Rock Climber Alternatives: Rock Climber may not be combined with Intimidating, Cavewight, Plagueborn, or Scavenger
Half-Orc-Sacred Tattoo Alternatives: Sacred Tattoo may not be combined with Orc Ferocity, Beastmaster, Bestial, Gatecrasher, Plagueborn, or Toothy
Half-Orc-Scavenger Alternatives: Scavenger may not be combined with Intimidating, Cavewight, Plagueborn, or Rock Climber
Half-Orc-Toothy Alternatives: Toothy may not be combined with Orc Ferocity, Beastmaster, Bestial, Gatecrasher, Plagueborn, or Sacred Tattoo
